Spain: Ramiro the Monk died. Petronilla succeeded him as queen regnant of Aragon.
Alfonso the Emperor died. His kingdom was divided between his two sons. The elder, Sancho III the Desired of Castile, received Castile; the younger, Ferdinand II of León, received León.
Russia: Yuri I of Kiev was intoxicated and died. Iziaslav of Chernigov became prince of Kiev.
India: The Kalachuris of Kalyani under Bijjala II capture Kalyani
China: The Jin capital was moved to Kaifeng.
